source: Google AI Blog / Vertex AI Documentation
highlights: Gemini 3 Pro (preview) and Flash (preview) released late 2025.
Key Features: Deep Think (enhanced reasoning), Multimodal function responses, Streaming Function calling.
Agentic Capabilities: Native support for agentic coding and 'Google Antigravity' platform.
action_taken: Updated methodology context; monitoring 'Antigravity' integration patterns.

highlights: Claude Code emphasizes 'Agentic Coding' where AI acts as a collaborator.
MCP (Model Context Protocol) is the standard for tool orchestration.
Best Practices: Use `CLAUDE.md` for global vs local rules to guide agent behavior.
Requested skill for building K8s operators.
Implemented support for Python (Kopf) and Go (Kubebuilder) patterns.
